name: Contours of a Dream
description:
Warning! This is an outdated version. Proceed here to play the remake.

Contours of a Dream is a short first person atmospheric experience.

Collect glowing spheres and reveal the mystery...

Be warned that the game goes fullscreen and uses your current desktop resolution.

Controls:

WASD or Left Stick – Move

Mouse or Right Stick – Look

LShift or LB – Sprint

Space of RB – Jump

Esc – Quit instantly
